reviews.text: Although this is a “boutique” hotel; there’s no coffee and tea facilities inside of rooms. Ao if you are a early morning coffee drinker; you must wake up, get out of your bed, wear your clothes and go down to the restaurant to be able to get a coffee! And no complimentary bottles of water. These items do not costs much more than 2-3 Euros! If you pretended to be a stylish boutique hotel, you should consider what your guests would expect…. Another thing is the tap water. It is placed on the wall; too much high and every time you wash hands or face, the water splashes out and your dresses are getting wet! Beside of that, lights buttons near the bed were not working, so it was very hard to wake up during the night to go and switch lights than to go to the bathroom……! The property must seriously consider these remarks….

Very nice hotel in the center of Podgorica with a lot of bars around that gets loud in the night but the hotel has soundproof rooms so besides having fun you can also sleep well here. They have a great bar and a restourant with nice breakfast and good service.

we found this treasure hotel when visiting Himara,  ans we fell in love with the whole place,
the view from the terrace is amalzing, the rooms are so nice and clean, and all the women working here was so lovely, the location is perfect, close to both harbour ans all the beaches.
there is a great beach just outside.
and also the price of the rooms was so affordable, thank u❤️

We did not stay here although I wish we had! This place is so full of hospitality and they were extremely kind to us. Being an American traveler I would rate this a 10 if I could! Very good food. We ordered the Tuna and it was beyond delicious. My husband had the teriyaki chicken it was excellent. We had the Cevapa (their version of sausage) excellent as well! You will not go wrong here. They are very kind to Americans! Next time we will most likely stay here.

One of the worst meals of my whole life. A Cesar salad with the chicken separated from the rest but both were so salty it was impossible to eat. Had the worst stomach pain ever after this. Completely ruined a fun night!
